panels.description:
Shows the number of virtual machines by lifecycle phases 

* `Pending` - VM awaits resources (e.g., disks, IP addresses) after creation or restart.
* `Starting` - VM attempts to start on a cluster node with resources ready.
* `Running` - VM is operational, running on a node.
* `Stopping` - VM is being stopped or rebooted.
* `Stopped` - VM is inactive, using no computational resources.
* `Terminating` - VM is being deleted, releasing resources.
* `Migrating` - VM is live-migrated to another node, requiring non-local disks.
panels.title: VM statuses

panels.description:
Shows the number of virtual disk by lifecycle phases
- `Pending` - waiting for all dependent resources required for disk creation to be ready.
- `Provisioning` - disk creation process is in progress.
- `Resizing` - the process of resizing the disk is in progress.
- `WaitForFirstConsumer` - the disk is waiting for the virtual machine that will use it to be created.
- `WaitForUserUpload` - the disk is waiting for the user to upload an image (type: Upload).
- `Ready` - the disk has been created and is ready for use.
- `Failed` - an error occurred during the creation process.
- `PVCLost` - system error, PVC with data has been lost.
- `Terminating` - the disk is being deleted. The disk may "hang" in this state if it is still connected to the virtual machine.
panels.title: Disk statuses

panels.description: Displays resource quota usage (CPU, Memory, Storage) as percentage of available limits. Requires resource quotas to be configured in the namespace.

targets.expr:
(  
    (sum(kube_resourcequota{namespace=~"$namespace", resource="requests.cpu", type="used"}))
)
/
( 
    (sum(kube_resourcequota{namespace=~"$namespace", resource="requests.cpu", type="hard"}) / 100)
) or vector(0)

(  
    sum(kube_resourcequota{namespace=~"$namespace", resource="requests.memory", type="used"})
)
/
( 
    (sum(kube_resourcequota{namespace=~"$namespace", resource="requests.memory", type="hard"}) / 100)
) or vector(0)

(
    sum(kube_resourcequota{namespace=~"$namespace", resource="requests.storage", type="used"})
)
/
(
    (sum(kube_resourcequota{namespace=~"$namespace", resource="requests.storage", type="hard"}) / 100)
) or vector(0)

panels.title: Quota usage

panels.description:
Shows the total allocated resources from resource quotas:

* `CPU Cores` - total CPU cores allocated
* `Memory` - total memory allocated
* `Storage` - total storage allocated
panels.title: Quota allocation

panels.description:
Shows the count of additional virtualization resources:

* `VirtualImages` - number of virtual images
* `VirtualDiskSnapshots` - number of disk snapshots
* `VirtualMachineSnapshots` - number of virtual machine snapshots
panels.title: Other resources

panels.description:
Shows the total resource quota limits configured for the namespace:

* `CPU Cores` - maximum CPU cores allowed
* `Memory` - maximum memory allowed
* `Storage` - maximum storage allowed
panels.title: Quota

panels.description:
Shows the actual resource usage by virtual machines:

* `CPU Cores` - current CPU usage by VMs
* `Memory` - current memory usage by VMs
* `Storage` - current storage usage by VMs
panels.title: VM Usage

panels.description:
Detailed table of all virtual machines with status information, resources and links to detailed dashboards

* `Pending` - VM awaits resources (e.g., disks, IP addresses) after creation or restart.
* `Starting` - VM attempts to start on a cluster node with resources ready.
* `Running` - VM is operational, running on a node.
* `Stopping` - VM is being stopped or rebooted.
* `Stopped` - VM is inactive, using no computational resources.
* `Terminating` - VM is being deleted, releasing resources.
* `Migrating` - VM is live-migrated to another node, requiring non-local disks.

targets.expr:
count by (namespace, name) (
    label_replace(
        d8_virtualization_virtualdisk_status_in_use{namespace=~"$namespace"}, 
        "name", 
        "$1", 
        "virtualmachine", 
        "(.+)"
    )
) * on(namespace, name) group_left() (
    d8_virtualization_virtualmachine_status_phase{namespace=~"$namespace"} == 1
)

count by (namespace, name) (
    label_replace(
        d8_virtualization_virtualmachinesnapshot_info{namespace=~"$namespace"}, 
        "name", 
        "$1", 
        "virtualmachine", 
        "(.+)"
    )
) * on(namespace, name) group_left() (
    d8_virtualization_virtualmachine_status_phase{namespace=~"$namespace"} == 1
)

panels.title: Virtual machines

panels.description:
Timeline of virtual machine status changes for tracking their lifecycle

**VM Phases:**
* `Pending` - VM awaits resources (e.g., disks, IP addresses) after creation or restart
* `Starting` - VM attempts to start on a cluster node with resources ready
* `Running` - VM is operational, running on a node
* `Stopping` - VM is being stopped or rebooted
* `Stopped` - VM is inactive, using no computational resources
* `Terminating` - VM is being deleted, releasing resources
* `Migrating` - VM is live-migrated to another node, requiring non-local disks
* `Degraded` - VM is in a degraded state
* `Pause` - VM is paused

targets.expr:
sum by (name,namespace) ((d8_virtualization_virtualmachine_status_phase{namespace=~"$namespace"} == 1) * on(phase) group_left()
    (
      label_replace(vector(1), "phase", "Degraded", "", "") or
      label_replace(vector(2), "phase", "Migrating", "", "") or
      label_replace(vector(3), "phase", "Pause", "", "") or
      label_replace(vector(4), "phase", "Pending", "", "") or
      label_replace(vector(5), "phase", "Running", "", "") or
      label_replace(vector(6), "phase", "Starting", "", "") or
      label_replace(vector(7), "phase", "Stopped", "", "") or
      label_replace(vector(8), "phase", "Stopping", "", "") or
      label_replace(vector(9), "phase", "Terminating", "", "")
    ))

panels.title: VM status timeline

panels.description: Chart showing changes in total CPU cores over time
panels.title: CPU Cores total

panels.description: Chart showing changes in total memory usage by virtual machines over time
panels.title: Memory usage total

panels.description:
Detailed table of all virtual disk with status information

- `Pending` - waiting for all dependent resources required for disk creation to be ready.
- `Provisioning` - disk creation process is in progress.
- `Resizing` - the process of resizing the disk is in progress.
- `WaitForFirstConsumer` - the disk is waiting for the virtual machine that will use it to be created.
- `WaitForUserUpload` - the disk is waiting for the user to upload an image (type: Upload).
- `Ready` - the disk has been created and is ready for use.
- `Failed` - an error occurred during the creation process.
- `PVCLost` - system error, PVC with data has been lost.
- `Terminating` - the disk is being deleted. The disk may "hang" in this state if it is still connected to the virtual machine.

targets.expr:
count by (namespace, name) (
    label_replace(
        d8_virtualization_virtualdisksnapshot_info{namespace=~"$namespace"}, 
        "name", 
        "$1", 
        "virtualdisk", 
        "(.+)"
    )
) * on(namespace, name) group_left() (
    d8_virtualization_virtualdisk_status_phase{namespace=~"$namespace"} == 1
)

panels.title: Virtual disks
